verses.verse: אֵיכָה֩ <WH349> how יָעִ֨יב <WH5743> with a cloud בְּאַפּ֤וֹ ׀ <WH639> in his anger אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> How hath the Lord אֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הִשְׁלִ֤יךְ <WH7993> [and] cast down מִשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> from heaven אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> unto the earth תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> the beauty יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not זָכַ֥ר <WH2142> and remembered הֲדֹם־ <WH1916> stool רַגְלָ֖יו <WH7272> be able to endure בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> of his anger ס

בִּלַּ֨ע <WH1104> hath swallowed up אֲדֹנָ֜י <WH136> The Lord [לֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not ק) חָמַ֗ל <WH2550> and hath not pitied אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> all the habitations יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob הָרַ֧ס <WH2040> he hath thrown down בְּעֶבְרָת֛וֹ <WH5678> in his wrath מִבְצְרֵ֥י <WH4013> the strong holds בַת־ <WH1323> of the daughter יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah הִגִּ֣יעַ <WH5060> he hath brought [them] down לָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> to the ground חִלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> he hath polluted מַמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> the kingdom וְשָׂרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH8269> and the princes ס

גָּדַ֣ע <WH1438> He hath cut off בָּֽחֳרִי־ <WH2750> in [his] fierce אַ֗ף <WH639> anger כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All קֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> all the horn יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> he hath drawn אָח֛וֹר <WH268> back יְמִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> his right hand מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before אוֹיֵ֑ב <WH341> the enemy וַיִּבְעַ֤ר <WH1197> and he burned בְּיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> against Jacob כְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire לֶֽהָבָ֔ה <WH3852> like a flaming אָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> [which] devoureth סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about ס

דָּרַ֨ךְ <WH1869> He hath bent קַשְׁתּ֜וֹ <WH7198> his bow כְּאוֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> like an enemy נִצָּ֤ב <WH5324> he stood יְמִינוֹ֙ <WH3225> with his right hand כְּצָ֔ר <WH6862> as an adversary וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> and slew כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מַחֲמַדֵּי־ <WH4261> all [that were] pleasant עָ֑יִן <WH5869> to the eye בְּאֹ֙הֶל֙ <WH168> in the tabernacle בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion שָׁפַ֥ךְ <WH8210> he poured out כָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> like fire חֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH2534> his fury ס

הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> has become אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <WH136> The Lord כְּאוֹיֵב֙ <WH341> was as an enemy בִּלַּ֣ע <WH1104> he hath swallowed up יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel בִּלַּע֙ <WH1104> he hath swallowed up כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH759> all her palaces שִׁחֵ֖ת <WH7843> he hath destroyed מִבְצָרָ֑יו <WH4013> his strong holds וַיֶּ֙רֶב֙ <WH7235> and hath increased בְּבַת־ <WH1323> in the daughter יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah תַּאֲנִיָּ֖ה <WH8386> mourning וַאֲנִיָּֽה׃ <WH592> and lamentation ס

וַיַּחְמֹ֤ס <WH2554> And he hath violently taken away כַּגַּן֙ <WH1588> as [if it were of] a garden שֻׂכּ֔וֹ <WH7900> his tabernacle שִׁחֵ֖ת <WH7843> he hath destroyed מוֹעֲד֑וֹ <WH4150> his places of the assembly שִׁכַּ֨ח <WH7911> to be forgotten יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD בְּצִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> in Zion מוֹעֵ֣ד <WH4150> hath caused the solemn feasts וְשַׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> and sabbaths וַיִּנְאַ֥ץ <WH5006> and hath despised בְּזַֽעַם־ <WH2195> in the indignation אַפּ֖וֹ <WH639> of his anger מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְכֹהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> and the priest ס

זָנַ֨ח <WH2186> hath cast off אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <WH136> The Lord מִזְבְּחוֹ֙ <WH4196> his altar נִאֵ֣ר <WH5010> he hath abhorred מִקְדָּשׁ֔וֹ <WH4720> his sanctuary הִסְגִּיר֙ <WH5462> he hath given up בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אוֹיֵ֔ב <WH341> of the enemy חוֹמֹ֖ת <WH2346> the walls אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH759> of her palaces ק֛וֹל <WH6963> a noise נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> they have made בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> as in the day מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of a solemn feast ס

חָשַׁ֨ב <WH2803> hath purposed יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD לְהַשְׁחִית֙ <WH7843> to destroy חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> the wall בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion נָ֣טָה <WH5186> he hath stretched out קָ֔ו <WH6957> a line לֹא־ <WH3808> has not הֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> he hath not withdrawn יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand מִבַּלֵּ֑עַ <WH1104> from destroying וַיַּֽאֲבֶל־ <WH56> to lament חֵ֥ל <WH2426> therefore he made the rampart וְחוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> and the wall יַחְדָּ֥ו <WH3162> together אֻמְלָֽלוּ׃ <WH535> they languished ס

טָבְע֤וּ <WH2883> are sunk בָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> into the ground שְׁעָרֶ֔יהָ <WH8179> Her gates אִבַּ֥ד <WH6> he hath destroyed וְשִׁבַּ֖ר <WH7665> and broken בְּרִיחֶ֑יהָ <WH1280> her bars מַלְכָּ֨הּ <WH4428> her king וְשָׂרֶ֤יהָ <WH8269> and her princes בַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> [are] among the Gentiles אֵ֣ין <WH369> is no תּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> the law גַּם־ <WH1571> Also נְבִיאֶ֕יהָ <WH5030> [is] no [more] her prophets לֹא־ <WH3808> No מָצְא֥וּ <WH4672> also find חָז֖וֹן <WH2377> no vision מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> from the LORD ס

יֵשְׁב֨וּ <WH3427> sit לָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> upon the ground יִדְּמוּ֙ <WH1826> [and] keep silence זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> The elders בַת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הֶֽעֱל֤וּ <WH5927> they have cast up עָפָר֙ <WH6083> dust עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָׁ֔ם <WH7218> upon their heads חָגְר֖וּ <WH2296> they have girded שַׂקִּ֑ים <WH8242> themselves with sackcloth הוֹרִ֤ידוּ <WH3381> hang down לָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> to the ground רֹאשָׁ֔ן <WH7218> their heads בְּתוּלֹ֖ת <WH1330> the virgins יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem ס

כָּל֨וּ <WH3615> do fail בַדְּמָע֤וֹת <WH1832> with tears עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> Mine eyes חֳמַרְמְר֣וּ <WH2560> are troubled מֵעַ֔י <WH4578> my bowels נִשְׁפַּ֤ךְ <WH8210> is poured לָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> upon the earth כְּבֵדִ֔י <WH3516> my liver עַל־ <WH5921> Because שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> for the destruction בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> of my people בֵּֽעָטֵ֤ף <WH5848> swoon עוֹלֵל֙ <WH5768> because the children וְיוֹנֵ֔ק <WH3243> and the sucklings בִּרְחֹב֖וֹת <WH7339> in the streets קִרְיָֽה׃ <WH7151> of the city ס

לְאִמֹּתָם֙ <WH517> to their mothers יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> They say אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> Where דָּגָ֣ן <WH1715> Where [is] corn וָיָ֑יִן <WH3196> banqueting בְּהִֽתְעַטְּפָ֤ם <WH5848> cover כֶּֽחָלָל֙ <WH2491> as the wounded בִּרְחֹב֣וֹת <WH7339> in the streets עִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city בְּהִשְׁתַּפֵּ֣ךְ <WH8210> was poured out נַפְשָׁ֔ם <WH5315> when their soul אֶל־ <WH413> about חֵ֖יק <WH2436> bosom אִמֹּתָֽם׃ <WH517> into their mothers' ס

מָֽה־ <WH4100> for thee? what thing אֲעִידֵ֞ךְ <WH5749> admonish מָ֣ה <WH4100> to what אֲדַמֶּה־ <WH1819> shall I liken לָּ֗ךְ הַבַּת֙ <WH1323> to thee O daughter יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem מָ֤ה <WH4100> to what אַשְׁוֶה־ <WH7737> liken לָּךְ֙ וַאֲנַֽחֲמֵ֔ךְ <WH5162> to thee that I may comfort בְּתוּלַ֖ת <WH1330> thee O virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> Zion כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is as גָד֥וֹל <WH1419> [is] great כַּיָּ֛ם <WH3220> like the sea שִׁבְרֵ֖ךְ <WH7667> affliction מִ֥י <WH4310> Who יִרְפָּא־ <WH7495> who can heal לָֽךְ׃ ס

נְבִיאַ֗יִךְ <WH5030> Thy prophets חָ֤זוּ <WH2372> have seen לָךְ֙ שָׁ֣וְא <WH7723> vain וְתָפֵ֔ל <WH8602> and foolish things וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not גִלּ֥וּ <WH1540> for thee and they have not discovered עַל־ <WH5921> and עֲוֹנֵ֖ךְ <WH5771> thine iniquity לְהָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> to turn away [שְׁבִיתֵךְ כ] (שְׁבוּתֵ֑ךְ <WH7622> captive ק) וַיֶּ֣חֱזוּ <WH2372> but have seen לָ֔ךְ מַשְׂא֥וֹת <WH4864> burdens שָׁ֖וְא <WH7723> for thee false וּמַדּוּחִֽים׃ <WH4065> and causes of banishment ס

סָֽפְק֨וּ <WH5606> by clap עָלַ֤יִךְ <WH5921> and כַּפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH3709> [their] hands כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֹ֣בְרֵי <WH5674> All that pass דֶ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> at thee שָֽׁרְקוּ֙ <WH8319> they hiss וַיָּנִ֣עוּ <WH5128> and wag רֹאשָׁ֔ם <WH7218> their head עַל־ <WH5921> At בַּ֖ת <WH1323> at the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הֲזֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> [saying Is] this the city שֶׁיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> that [men] call כְּלִ֣ילַת <WH3632> The perfection יֹ֔פִי <WH3308> of beauty מָשׂ֖וֹשׂ <WH4885> The joy לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> common ס

פָּצ֨וּ <WH6475> have opened עָלַ֤יִךְ <WH5921> against פִּיהֶם֙ <WH6310> their mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> All א֣וֹיְבַ֔יִךְ <WH341> All thine enemies שָֽׁרְקוּ֙ <WH8319> against thee they hiss וַיַּֽחַרְקוּ־ <WH2786> and gnash שֵׁ֔ן <WH8127> the teeth אָמְר֖וּ <WH559> they say בִּלָּ֑עְנוּ <WH1104> We have swallowed [her] up אַ֣ךְ <WH389> certainly זֶ֥ה <WH2088> this הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> this [is] the day שֶׁקִּוִּינֻ֖הוּ <WH6960> that we looked for מָצָ֥אנוּ <WH4672> we have found רָאִֽינוּ׃ <WH7200> we have seen ס

עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> hath done יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what זָמָ֗ם <WH2161> [that] which he had devised בִּצַּ֤ע <WH1214> he hath fulfilled אֶמְרָתוֹ֙ <WH565> his word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> that he had commanded מִֽימֵי־ <WH3117> in the days קֶ֔דֶם <WH6924> of old הָרַ֖ס <WH2040> he hath thrown down וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without חָמָ֑ל <WH2550> and hath not pitied וַיְשַׂמַּ֤ח <WH8055> to rejoice עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> over אוֹיֵ֔ב <WH341> and he hath caused [thine] enemy הֵרִ֖ים <WH7311> over thee he hath set up קֶ֥רֶן <WH7161> the horn צָרָֽיִךְ׃ <WH6862> of thine adversaries ס

צָעַ֥ק <WH6817> cried לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> Their heart אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> unto the Lord חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> O wall בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִ֠יּוֹן <WH6726> of Zion הוֹרִ֨ידִי <WH3381> run down כַנַּ֤חַל <WH5158> like a river דִּמְעָה֙ <WH1832> let tears יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and night אַֽל־ <WH408> no תִּתְּנִ֤י <WH5414> give פוּגַת֙ <WH6314> thyself no rest לָ֔ךְ אַל־ <WH408> no תִּדֹּ֖ם <WH1826> cease בַּת־ <WH1323> let not the apple עֵינֵֽךְ׃ <WH5869> of thine eye ס

ק֣וּמִי ׀ <WH6965> Arise רֹ֣נִּי <WH7442> cry out [בַלַּיִל כ] (בַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> night ק) לְרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> in the beginning אַשְׁמֻר֔וֹת <WH821> of the watches שִׁפְכִ֤י <WH8210> pour out כַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> like water לִבֵּ֔ךְ <WH3820> thine heart נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> before פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> of the Lord שְׂאִ֧י <WH5375> lift up אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> to כַּפַּ֗יִךְ <WH3709> thy hands עַל־ <WH5921> unto נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> toward him for the life עֽוֹלָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5768> of thy young children הָעֲטוּפִ֥ים <WH5848> that faint בְּרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> for hunger בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> in the top כָּל־ <WH3605> of every חוּצֽוֹת׃ <WH2351> of every street ס

רְאֵ֤ה <WH7200> Behold יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD וְֽהַבִּ֔יטָה <WH5027> and consider לְמִ֖י <WH4310> whom עוֹלַ֣לְתָּ <WH5953> to whom thou hast done כֹּ֑ה <WH3541> this אִם־ <WH518> lo תֹּאכַ֨לְנָה <WH398> eat נָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> Shall the women פִּרְיָם֙ <WH6529> their fruit עֹלֲלֵ֣י <WH5768> [and] children טִפֻּחִ֔ים <WH2949> who אִם־ <WH518> lo יֵהָרֵ֛ג <WH2026> be slain בְּמִקְדַּ֥שׁ <WH4720> in the sanctuary אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> the Lord כֹּהֵ֥ן <WH3548> chief ruler וְנָבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> and the prophet ס

שָׁכְב֨וּ <WH7901> lie לָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> on the ground חוּצוֹת֙ <WH2351> in the streets נַ֣עַר <WH5288> The young וְזָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> and the old בְּתוּלֹתַ֥י <WH1330> my virgins וּבַחוּרַ֖י <WH970> and my young men נָפְל֣וּ <WH5307> are fallen בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> by the sword הָרַ֙גְתָּ֙ <WH2026> thou hast slain בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> [them] in the day אַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> of thine anger טָבַ֖חְתָּ <WH2873> thou hast killed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not חָמָֽלְתָּ׃ <WH2550> [and] not pitied ס

תִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> Thou hast called כְי֨וֹם <WH3117> day מוֹעֵ֤ד <WH4150> as in a solemn מְגוּרַי֙ <WH4032> my terrors מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> so that in the day אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S פָּלִ֣יט <WH6412> none escaped וְשָׂרִ֑יד <WH8300> nor remained אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom טִפַּ֥חְתִּי <WH2946> those that I have swaddled וְרִבִּ֖יתִי <WH7235> and brought up אֹיְבִ֥י <WH341> hath mine enemy כִלָּֽם׃ <WH3615> consumed פ
